galpy.util.bovy_coords.rect_to_cyl¶

galpy.util.bovy_coords.rect_to_cyl(X, Y, Z)¶
NAME:
rect_to_cyl
PURPOSE:
convert from rectangular to cylindrical coordinates
INPUT:
X, Y, Z - rectangular coordinates
OUTPUT:
[:,3] R,phi,z
HISTORY:
2010-09-24 - Written - Bovy (NYU)
